name: GRAL
description: GRAL is a futuristic racing game with combat elements, a tribute to the 90s games such as Megarace, POD, DethKarz. Rides fast racing cars that spin 600Mph on articulated tracks with shortcuts, jumps, parabolic and death rides!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core G4560 3.6GHz / AMD FX-8150 3.6GHz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD HD6850 / Nvidia GTX560 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 12 GB available space Additional Notes: For split-screen mode 2 Controllers or a Controller and a keyboard are needed at least.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 3.6GHz or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 12 GB available space Additional Notes: For split-screen mode 2 Controllers or a Controller and a keyboard are needed at least.
